definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The next generation of groupware tools focused on these communications problems.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的一代群件工具是以通信问题为重点的。

sentences.english: We recently started to work with Group-Office groupware.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我们开始与集团办公室群件。

sentences.english: Where supreme adaptability is required, out-of-control swarmware is what you want.
sentences.chinese: 在需要终极适应性的地方，你所需要的是失控的群件。

sentences.english: Groove is a good example of this third generation of groupware tools.
sentences.chinese: Groove是第三代群件工具中一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: If you need it, you can buy a groupware system.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，可以购买一个群件系统。

sentences.english: Many products are available today that are worthy of the "groupware" label.
sentences.chinese: 许多当今可利用的产品是值得贴上“群件”的标签的。

sentences.english: The second generation of groupware tools linked the different applications together.
sentences.chinese: 第二代群件工具是将不同的应用软件联系起来。
